title: Navigate forwards to a menu button
instructions: Starting at the 'Navigate forwards from here' link,, navigate to the menu button.

title: Navigate backwards to a menu button
instructions: Starting at the 'Navigate backwards from here' link,, navigate to the menu button.

title: Request information about a menu button
instructions: Starting at the 'WAI-ARIA Quick Links' menu button, read information about the menu button.

title: Open a menu
instructions: Starting at the 'WAI-ARIA Quick Links' menu button, open the menu.

title: Open a menu to the last item
instructions: Starting at the 'WAI-ARIA Quick Links' menu button, open the menu.

title: Request information about a menu item
instructions: Starting at the 'W3C Home Page' menu item, read information about the menu item.
assertions: nameFocusedItemHome roleFocusedItemMenuItem positionFocusedItemMenu1 numberItemsMenu6 nameMenuLinks roleMenu

title: Navigate to the first item in a menu
instructions: Starting at the 'Accessible Name and Description' menu item, navigate to the first menu item.

title: Navigate to the last item in a menu
instructions: Starting at the 'W3C Home Page' menu item, navigate to the last menu item.

title: Navigate to an item in a menu by typing a character
instructions: Starting at the 'W3C Home Page' menu item, type a character to navigate to a different menu item.

title: Activate a menu item
instructions: Starting at the 'W3C Home Page' menu item, activate the menu item.

title: Close a menu
instructions: Starting at the 'W3C Home Page' menu item, close the menu.
